main_character.description: The protagonist, often an ordinary person with extraordinary destiny.

hero.description: The character who embarks on a quest, overcoming challenges.

antagonist.description: The opposing force to the hero.

false_hero.description: A deceitful character posing as a hero but ultimately a false figure.

secondary_character.description: Supporting characters who aid or hinder the hero's journey.

helper.description: A character who assists the hero, offering wisdom or aid.

magical_helper.description: A supernatural being that provides powerful assistance.

prisoner.description: A trapped character, often driving the hero's actions.

quest_giver.description: A character who sends the hero on their journey, offering a mission or guidance.

hero_family.description: Family members who support the hero.

tertiary_character.description: Minor characters who play smaller role.
